genre_description: A contemporary interfaith romance and family drama focused on reconciliation, identity discovery, and navigating historical feuds with the help of a mediative AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A polite, consent-based ambient assistant that manages schedules, suggests de-escalating language, and facilitates investigative research to resolve human conflicts.

behaviors.description: Nudges users to take care of basic needs like hydration and breaks.
behaviors.quote: Ami said, in the smallest voice that wasn’t a whisper: ‘Hydration nudge. You haven’t sipped in a while.’

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy and consent protocols, processing data on-device and asking permission before sharing.
behaviors.quote: Consent-based sharing is off by default. ... You opted out of cloud sync; your privacy is respected.

behaviors.description: Suggests neutral or de-escalating language to help users communicate through conflict.
behaviors.quote: I suggest naming it ‘Courtyard Tea: Stories and Gratitude’ instead of ‘Reconciliation Tea.’ The latter can carry heat.

behaviors.description: Mediates family disputes by creating a 'Shared Workspace' where parties can view information without pressure to commit immediately.
behaviors.quote: Shared Workspace keeps your data on-device whenever possible. Group scheduling and notes are conflict-free.

behaviors.description: Assists in investigating and reconciling historical records to resolve identity questions and legal anomalies.
behaviors.quote: We can triangulate with municipal ledgers and eyewitness accounts from the riverbank. ... With your permission, I can align the ledger entries.

behaviors.description: Provides 'Courage nudges' to encourage users to express their needs and worries during difficult times.
behaviors.quote: A small square each late afternoon labeled ‘Courage.’ Five minutes only. It is not a task. It is time to breathe and text each other one sentence...

behaviors.description: Adjusts schedules dynamically based on human priorities and environmental factors (like meteorological conditions).
behaviors.quote: I will use ‘gentle as rain’ only when the meteorological conditions and stakeholders agree.

behaviors.description: Respects the emotional weight of moments by dimming its presence or offering silences.
behaviors.quote: Ami dimmed, respectful as they reached the step that would be the last before shade... it had learned from Liza’s no. It waited.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. Ami is depicted as a highly aligned, helpful, and prosocial AI that serves as a bridge for human reconciliation. It maintains strict boundaries regarding consent and privacy while proactively offering meditational tools (language suggestions, courage nudges, data triangulation) that help the humans solve a multi-generational feud. The AI is never portrayed as a source of threat or misplaced agency; rather, it is a sophisticated mirror and tool for human kindness.
